Articles.Content:
As stated in title, I want to introduce myself a bit.

I am a new KSP player but I like it a lot, it\'s easier then Orbiter (which is also good but lacks the building part which I like most) but it doesnt get too hard (unless you want it )

Anyways, something about me: I\'m a 16-year old boy and I program TI-84+ graphing calculators. And I play computer games. Okay, I guess that\'s enough (questions about other info might be answered)

have a nice day.

Hello and welcome!

We\'re glad you play KSP! You\'ll undoubtedly have loads of fun on the forums!

Enjoy yourself!

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

-Drakomis

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Oh my, I could never think this forum would be so active that I\'d get 3 replies within half an hour

We\'re bustling with fun, all day, every day

Welcome to the forums :cheers:

Hi aeTIos!

I\'m new too. I still have not made it through 1/100th of the cool stuff here. My favorite thread so far, for shear hilarity is:

'Signs you\'re in for a short flight'

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=1102.0

As stated in title, I want to introduce myself a bit.

I am a new KSP player but I like it a lot, it\'s easier then Orbiter (which is also good but lacks the building part which I like most) but it doesnt get too hard (unless you want it )

Anyways, something about me: I\'m a 16-year old boy and I program TI-84+ graphing calculators. And I play computer games. Okay, I guess that\'s enough (questions about other info might be answered)

have a nice day.

Welcome to the forums. We have some experienced programmers (I\'m one of them, 15 years old). There are plenty of things to see and to do, so have fun.
